description: Baseline test counts for quality ratcheting (issue #280)

native.note: MockStateMachine missing loopCount member - compilation errors preventing execution

quality_ratchet_rules.rule_1: Total test count must not decrease (except when removing dead code)
quality_ratchet_rules.rule_2: Passing test count must not decrease
quality_ratchet_rules.rule_3: New features must include tests before merge
quality_ratchet_rules.rule_4: Fixing a broken test counts as progress
